name: Flaw (Plasmeo)
description:
"- They need workforce in the outer rim colonies."

That's what helped you make up your mind. You could try your luck there and have a better life than in the polluted slums of Low-Earth. Instead you wake up lying on a cold rusty cell. Why are you here? The last thing you remember is travelling on board of the mining corporation's spaceship.

_____________________________________

  • Retro FPS
  • Inspired by the retro FPS wave of the last years. And by the actual retro FPS.

_____________________________________

As I am using an azerty keyboard layout, you might want to rebind the keys in the option menu.
